page.title: 08OUR HOME
page.content: My name is Shelley Atkinson and I am 11 years old.I have a brother called Darren who is nearly 8 years old and another brother called Richard who is 2 years old.Darren and I both go to All Saints' School but I will soon be going to Sunnydle Comprehensive School in Shildon. We live in a terraced house very close to our present school. It has 3 bedrooms,a kitchen,a lounge,a dining room and a bathroom and toilet. My Dad has built a shed in the back yard for our bikes.We own a car which my Dad uses for work. He takes my Mam shopping in the car and often takes us out for a drive to the seaside or up into the dales.
